name: In re ESTATE OF Nick KALICH, Deceased. (Appeal of George J. KALICH, Administrator of Estate). Helen FREDICAN, Margaret Roman, Ann Pluta, George Kalich, Michael Kalich and Richard Kalich, Appellants, v. Andrew J. KALICH and Alice Kalich, His Wife, Appellees

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE OF Nick KALICH, Deceased. (Appeal of George J. KALICH, Administrator of Estate). Helen FREDICAN, Margaret Roman, Ann Pluta, George Kalich, Michael Kalich and Richard Kalich, Appellants, v. Andrew J. KALICH and Alice Kalich, His Wife, Appellees.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Decrees of the Court of Common Pleas of Washington County are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Arthur M. Wilson, Wilson & Johnson, Washington, for appellants.
John J. Moschetta, Jr., Washington, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
435 A.2d 178
In re ESTATE OF Nick KALICH, Deceased. (Appeal of George J. KALICH, Administrator of Estate). Helen FREDICAN, Margaret Roman, Ann Pluta, George Kalich, Michael Kalich and Richard Kalich, Appellants, v. Andrew J. KALICH and Alice Kalich, His Wife, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 14, 1981.
Decided Oct. 8, 1981.
Arthur M. Wilson, Wilson & Johnson, Washington, for appellants.
John J. Moschetta, Jr., Washington, for appellees.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
